snippet: The military said it would investigate reports that soldiers killed a 13-year-old Palestinian during a confrontation near the West Bank city of Ramallah.
abstract: Israeli military says it will investigate reports that soldiers killed a 13-year-old Palestinian during a confrontation near the West Bank city of Ramallah.
lead_paragraph: The military said it would investigate reports that soldiers killed a 13-year-old Palestinian during a confrontation near the West Bank city of Ramallah.

headline.main: Israeli Troops Are Suspected in Shooting of a Teenager
headline.print_headline: Israeli Troops Are Suspected in Shooting of a Teenager
